p: Regarding A. baumannii and E. coli, all MICs values were equal to those of MBCs (10 to 20 μl/ml). As for P. aeruginosa, there was a difference between the MIC of India (10 μl/ml) and MICs of Syria, Saudi Arabia, and Morocco (20 μl/ml), but the MBCs values were the same for India, Morocco, and Saudi Arabia (30 μl/ml) with an increase in the MBC of Syria Eo (40 μl/ml).
